name: Gamblin' Gary
description:
Submitted for GMTK Game Jam 2022. Second jam. All art and code was produced by me within the time limit. Unfortunately I didn't have enough time for audio or a start menu.

Instructions:

  • Throw dice with Left Mouse.
  • Roll towards your mouse cursor with Right Mouse. This damages enemies (but also yourself, so be careful!).
  • Open the store with Backspace, Escape, or P to buy new dice and upgrade Gary! (Hint: Hover over upgrade icons for more information!)

Upgrades:

  • New Dice
  • Roll Damage Reduction
  • Max Health Increase
  • Self-Roll Damage Increase
  • Health Refill

Die Types:

  • Critical - Has a 50% chance to do double damage.
  • Seeking - If enemies enter a small radius of the die, it will seek towards the enemy.
  • Returning - After the die becomes inactive, it returns to Gary automatically.
